data.name: Kim Shooter
data.detailed_description:
Unfortunately, this game is no longer developed.

For good reason, being a young developer I made irretrievable errors in the development and in the code.
All the profits from this will allow me to make my future game even more excellent.
Thank you for your support.

-----
KIM SHOOTER is a single player shooting game from above. You are Kim, your goal is to exterminate the bandits, is to help the hostages. Browse the various missions to finish with these wired.

Skills [/]:
Several skills will be at your disposal. You'll unlock them with each new level of Kim.
They are essential to gain some levels.

Mechanisms [/]:
Mechanisms will be activated or resolved on the map to achieve the objectives of the mission. Open a door to free the hostages, or even hack the code to disable the turret.

Missions [/]
You have several missions, released the hostages, kill all the traffickers, recovered the drugs. Save the hostages from the hold-ups without killing them.


Developer's note [/]:
Warning ! The game is not available for rare resolutions like 1366x768. The most suitable resolution is 1920x1080.
This game is my first one that I develop. The indulgent way is to make me go away bugs are improvements.

data.short_description: KIM SHOOTER is a single player shooting game from above. You are Kim, your goal is to exterminate the bandits, is to help the hostages. Browse the various missions to finish with these wired.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2200k i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated HD5000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Attention ! Le jeu n'est pas disponible pour des résolutions rare comme 1366x768. La résolution la plus adaptée est 1920x1080.
